meaningMnemonic: Take <radical>three</radical> <radical>measurement</radical>s of <radical>gold</radical> and <radical>slide</radical> them into a mold to make a <kanji>cast</kanji>! You'll have cast three gold swords, or goblets, or ducks. Just make sure you follow those directions, or your casting won't come out right.
readingMnemonic: You open the <kanji>cast</kanji> to reveal your gold statue of <reading>Chew</reading>bacca (ちゅう)! It's life-size and now you have three! Your new gold Chewbacca casts are going to guard the entrance to your house.
